content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Iron Ore Processing Setup (around x=41-45, y=-80 to -82)
Complex automated mining and smelting setup consisting of:
- Burner mining drill at (41.0, -82.0) mining coal, working status
- Wooden chest at (41.5, -80.5) storing coal and iron ore
- Two burner inserters:
  - First inserter at (42.5, -80.5) configured to move items from chest to belt
  - Second inserter at (43.5, -80.5) configured to move items from belt to furnace
- Transport belt system between (42.5, -81.5) and (43.5, -81.5)
- Stone furnace at (45.0, -81.0) for smelting

ERROR TIPS
1. Inserter Configuration Issues
- Ensure inserter pickup and drop positions are properly aligned with source/destination
- When using belts, make sure inserters are positioned correctly relative to belt height
- Double check inserter rotation directions match the intended item flow

2. Resource Flow Issues
- Verify that items can properly flow through the entire production chain
- Ensure inserters have correct pickup/drop positions relative to chests and belts
- Check that furnaces have both fuel and ingredients accessible

NAMESPACE

Important Variables:
None explicitly defined in provided logs

Functions:
None explicitly defined in provided logs

The system appears to be focused on physical entity placement and configuration rather than programmatic function definitions.
